value.title: Public buses in Tamil Nadu to get AI-enabled panic button
value.excerpt: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M K Stalin on Saturday launched Artificial Intelligence (AI)-enabled panic button-cum-CCTV surveillance project in 500 Chennai buses as part of an initiative to improve the safety of women and children.

value.title: Call Center AI Market Growing at a CAGR 21.3% | Key Player IBM, Microsoft, Oracle, AWS, SAP
value.excerpt: The global Call Center AI Market size is to grow from USD 1.6 billion in 2022 to USD 4.1 billion by 2027, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 21.3% during the forecast period. The advent of AI in the call center offers enhanced customer support services and better experience coupled with rising development in customer engagement through social media platforms to boost the growth of the call center AI in the market.

value.title: Enhance the caller experience with hints in Amazon Lex
value.excerpt: We understand speech input better if we have some background on the topic of conversation. Consider a customer service agent at an auto parts wholesaler helping with orders. If the agent knows that the customer is looking for tires, they’re more likely to recognize responses (for example, “Michelin”)
